sentences: Ma tegin suurepärase töö ja tahan seda seada näitamiseks.
Me peame selle plaani seadmiseks kohtumist.
context: The Estonian verb 'seada' means to set up, arrange, place, or establish something. It can be used in various contexts such as setting up a display, arranging furniture, placing items in position, or establishing plans. The word is commonly used in everyday situations where organization or positioning of objects or ideas is required.
